snippet: The most important diagnostic manual for mental illnesses lacks scientific validity.
abstract: Editorial expresses concern over fact that Dr Thomas Insel, director of National Institute of Mental Health, has criticized American Psychiatric Assn's Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders for lacking scientific validity; notes that Insel calls for bolstering of manual using new classification based on biology, although such a biology-based system will not be available for decade or more.
lead_paragraph: The most important diagnostic manual for mental illnesses lacks scientific validity.

keywords.value: Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works
